name: Stoneface
description:
Sorry guys but this is a really lame 3D 'scary' game.

WASD/ZSQD to move.
Left click on things to interact/pick up.
Your goal is simply to get to the exit door.
Fill holes with sand from sandbags that you can find around the level.
If you find a battery, put it in a battery station to temporarily increase the power, which keeps out the bad guy.

Beware of Stoneface.

Small edit: Replaced faulty audio asset
